title: Instructional Design for Language Pedagogy Through Mobile Open Social Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of language teaching methodologies
context.additional_context: Targets preservice and in-service teachers, conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can operationalize instructional designs that use mobile-based social learning tools to facilitate daily interactions among language learners
Learners can analyze the strengths and weaknesses of formal and informal learning experiences in open social learning environments and incorporate findings into instructional design
Learners can develop three or more mobile-friendly language learning activities under 10 minutes by applying microlearning principles

resources: Access to open educational resource platforms
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
